home.title: Scan a Petition
home.description: Use your camera to capture petition pages. Images are processed securely and never stored on your device.

permission.title: Camera Access Needed
permission.description: To scan petitions, we need access to your camera. Your images are processed securely and never saved to your device.
permission.deniedDescription: Camera access was denied. To scan petitions:
permission.unsupportedDescription: Your browser doesn't support camera access. Try using Chrome, Safari, or Firefox on a mobile device.

prompt.title: Add Scan Location?
prompt.description: Adding your location helps track where petitions are being circulated. Your exact position is never stored — we round to roughly a city block (~100m) for privacy.

denied.title: Location Access Denied
denied.description: Location access was denied. You can continue without sharing your location.
